Summary: [Checkout page] The Subtotal & Total prices do not reflect the product quantity when it more than one

Steps to reproduce.2: Add any item to the Cart
Steps to reproduce.4: Change quantity of the product to (or more)
Steps to reproduce.6: Review the Subtotal price & Total price

Expected result: The Subtotal & Total prices should reflect the product quantity
Actual result: The Subtotal & Total prices do not reflect the product quantity
